name: xynga-form-elements
description: Holds all the components classified under the label of "Form-Elements"

scripts.link-build: npm link && cd testing && npm link xynga-form-elements
scripts.setup: cd src && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd testing && npm i && cd .. && npm run link-build
scripts.start: cd testing && start chrome http://localhost:4200 && ng serve
